TopicTitle: Staging gone haywire on me for some reason today...

Articles.Content:
**Wait before you read on, I dont mean I dont know how to change stages, it is something wrong with 1.0.2 that's mesmerized me for quite some time after making a tank. Now here is the thing, the staging is properly set up and the missiles work. However, the two mini missles as shown in the video, upon activating the next stage to decouple and activate the sepratrons, ( I think its a bug), the cubic struts randomly fall off and the sepratrons dont activate until I hit stage again although I only added two stages. Some weird stuff. Every time the video pauses and something else happens that was a stage. I may be unclear but here is the video:**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FYQa-LQnB_U?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
I think it is clipping... try a craft that consists of just missiles, or firing missiles before separating the turret.

Firing the missiles before separating the turrets does not work. The craft works by itself made in the VAB as a subassembly and imported. It worked a long time ago but now its not still... My tank is under the influence of the kraken...
